text: Bloomingdale's Inc. is an American luxury department store chain founded in 1861 by Joseph Bloomingdale and Lyman Bloomingdale. It was bought by Federated Department Stores in 1930. As of 2024, the chain had a total of 32 owned department stores in the U.S. and 3 franchised stores in Dubai and Kuwait; 21 outlet stores (all in the U.S.), and 4 Bloomie's by Bloomingdales concept stores. Its headquarters is in the New York City borough of Manhattan. ==References== Category:1861 establishments in the United States Category:1860s establishments in New York (state) Category:American department stores Category:Companies based in New York City
title: Bloomingdale's
